phrases: W- why do we have to wait for Kakarrot!?
Because he is a traitor to us Saiyans.
We have to punish traitors.
We are going to kill his son and his friends...
After that, we are going to deal with him, nice and slow.
We are going to make him aware of just how powerless he is, as he writhes in agony.
And today, after another three or four hours...
I get it!
So that is why!
That sounds great!
That is all assuming that he gets here in the next three hours.
I will leave Kakarrot to you, but please let me take those other three!
Do as you like.
However,
do it after we get the Namekian to tell us about the Dragon Balls.
I sure hope that Kakarrot does come!
Kuririn- san...
Dammit, what are you doing, Goku?
Has he really come back to life?
Say, at this point, what if we ran away?
There is no way we can win.
This is no time to be stubborn!
Fool!
They plan on wiping out all of humanity in any case.
Even if you run away now, you will end up the same.
D- dammit!
Please, Goku, get here!
Show us how much stronger than them you have become!
Hurry!
Hurry!
Hurry!
Not yet?
Guys!
Hang in there a little longer!
Piccolo,
Goku is sure to be here in the next three hours, right?
Who knows?
Think of some way to inflict some damage on them,
however little, before Son Goku gets here.
Regardless of how much power Goku may have gained at Kaio's place,
his chances of fighting both of them and winning are next to impossible.
We have made some tremendous enemies here.
If only I... I had been more reliable earlier, Tenshinhan- san...
That is right!
Who knew you were such a coward!?
Piccolo, be reasonable.
Gohan is still only 5 years old.
Ordinarily, he would be in kindergarten right now.
It is miraculous that he is even here, is not it?
Kuririn- san...
Gohan, I thought I had raised you up to be a man.
Piccolo- san!
P- please re-train me for the next three hours!
Do not act like a spoiled child!
I have got no time for cowards!
Get out of here, now!
P- Piccolo- san!
P- Piccolo!
Gohan, l've taught you everything I know.
Gohan, come back!
You have got to show Goku how big and strong you have grown!
Gohan!
Kid!
You trying to run away!?
Well, that would be the smart thing to do.
W- who is running away!?
I just have to go pee!
And if you guys are going to go home, now is your chance.
What was that?
I did not hear you.
Your momma's belly-button sticks out!
That brat!
H- how...
How did you know my mommy's belly-button sticks out!?
The mysterious energy that had enveloped the battleground has disappeared,
as though it were never there, which has allowed us to get closer,
so we are going to try to get in as close to the scene as we can.
What in the world could be happening?
I am unaware of the details,
but could it be that they have called a time-out?
I- in any event, it is certain that the intense fighting
that was going on earlier is not occurring now.
Could they be taking a break?
What could this be?
I do not care what it is.
If they can buy even one minute- one second of time to let Goku come back,
nothing could work to our advantage better.
I guess so.
I wonder if Son- kun will get back during this time.
On the other hand,
if Piccolo gets killed, Kami- sama dies too, right?
What happens to our world if that happens!?
Is not it obvious?
Either way, if Son- kun and the others do not defeat those Saiyans...
Goku!
Get here quick and defeat them!
If I have to die anyway,
I wish I could have collected more gals' panties before I went.
Frankly, that is not possible.
Then there is no way they can win!?
I am saying that there are not any gals that are stupid enough
to let their panties be stolen by you.
-Why, you jerk... -Gohan!
Chichi, have you come around?
Are you okay?
W- where is Gohan- chan?
Relax.
He is still all right.
Gohan- chan!
He is doing fine.
We have to hurry and save him!
We cannot!
That is nowhere that we can get close to!
All we can do is wait here.
Gohan- chan...
I am going to go have a little fun.
I cannot just sit still here for three hours, after all.
Suit yourself.
But Nappa, do not go overdoing it, now.
Why not?
For the sake of the hellish show we are going to have in three hours.
That is Vegeta for you!
It will be fine, do not worry about it!
One of the Saiyans has taken to the skies by himself!
Where exactly is he planning to go?
I- it appears that he is coming toward our direction!
He is rapidly approaching us!
G- get us out of here!
H- he is chasing after us!
H- here he comes!
Run!
You guys are a blight!
Away with you!
G- Gohan- chan...
C- Chichi!
So this planet has this sort of military, does it?
This should be a good time killer.
I thought these guys would be a little more effective, but they are all worthless.
Beat it!
You guys were a waste of my time.
By the way, has not Goku come by the way yet?
No matter how funny my jokes are, this is no time for laughs.
The fate of the earth is at stake!
Hurry, Son Goku!
I see it!
Just a little farther!
Goku's presence!?
Yeah!
He is getting close!
He just might be in time!
Another two hours, huh?
You know, this planet Earth here
is a more wondrous world than any I have seen before.
We will be able to sell this one for a lot!
So this is the level of people it has, huh?
One more hour.
Kakarrot has not just lost his nerve and run away, right?
Go for broke...
Looks like that is all we can do.
He is arrived!
Son Goku has arrived!
Oh, Kami- sama!
Hurry!
The Serpentine Road has ended!
That was fast!
That was wonderfully fast!
Now then, there are only ten minutes left.
Shall I finish up with a little more fun?
Scream!
Suffer!
Writhe in agony!
You would only live until tonight anyhow.
We are going to turn all of you on earth into space dust.
And the most hellish show still awaits.
There are two powerful Ki, separated from each other.
What is going on?
And so, with Goku still absent, the three hours had passed.
Time.
Damn!
Looks like waiting for him did not do any good.
He is still not here?
That coward Kakarrot did not come.
F- Father is not a coward!
Dammit!
Why is not he here!?
Son Goku...
Now then, to take my time in making you hurt...
It is too bad I could not show this to Kakarrot, though.
lt's almost time when I could die, too...
Dammit, I feel like a suicide trooper!
There is only one possibility for us to beat him.
Of course, that is only if everything goes well.
Listen up.
First, Kuririn, you go all-out to draw his attention.
And then I will find an opening to grab his tail, a Saiyan's weak point.
R- right...
Once his power fails him, and he cannot move,
Gohan, you will call up all of your power and rush him.
Got that?
Yes.
It will be okay.
I will not run away this time.
Of course you will not.
Remember that the fate of the earth rests in your hands!
All right!
Awesome!
That is Piccolo for you!
l'm starting to see a little light here.
We just might win!
Gohan, believe in yourself!
When you set your mind to it, your power is even greater than mine.
All right!
Goku!
Kami- sama!
Hurry and grab hold!
You are on!
T- that kid!
He really did come back from Kaio- sama's place!
Okay, I am off!
My training went great!
-We are counting on you!
-Good luck, Son Goku!
Guys!
Gohan!
Please be alive!
Here he comes!
Son Goku is quite tired.
Hey!
Karin- sama!
Here are the last two Senzu beans!
Thank you!
These will be a great help!
We are all counting on you!
I will eat one of them right now...
All right, I am at full health!
Kinto Un!!
It is been a long time, huh!?
I could sure use your help!
There are some incredible Ki gathered all together!
That way!
Hurry, Goku!
We are counting on you, Goku!
As fast as you can!
